details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 1.4 Distinguishable - 1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum)
details.description: The visual presentation of text and images of text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1. Large-scale text and images of large-scale text have a contrast ratio of at least 3:1.
